metadata.title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products,has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
love: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

zynaddsubfx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libsfml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
